text:
Eitan Haber (, born 12 March 1940 – 7 October 2020) was an Israeli journalist and publicist. He was known for his writing on military and security issues. He was a close ally and advisor to Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin. Haber was born in Tel Aviv. He worked for "Yedioth Ahronoth" as a correspondent on military issues.
Haber died on 7 October 2020 in Tel Aviv from pancreatic cancer at the age of 80.
